title: Pre-market action: Here's the trade setup for today's session

title: Falling provisions set to lift banks' RoA in December quarter
summary: Banks are likely to see lower provisioning for bad loans in the December quarter. This follows a significant drop in the previous quarter. Improved loan collection and fewer new bad loans are driving this trend. Stress in unsecured loans is also expected to ease. This should boost banks' profitability. Analysts anticipate better bank performance from the December quarter onwards.

title: DU Digital case sparks fears over SME market manipulation and retail investor safety
summary: The DU Digital stock manipulation case is the latest reminder of the structural vulnerabilities in the SME segment, which was designed as a lighter-touch platform to help smaller companies access capital, but has become a hotbed of speculative trading

title: Small-cap stock under  ₹50 Dhanlaxmi Bank jumps 5% after Q3FY26 business update
summary: In its third-quarter business update, the Kerala-based lender reported a 20.76% year-on-year rise in total business to  ₹31,933 crore as of December 31, 2025.

title: Reliance shares drop 1% from record high; ONGC down 2%— How to trade these oil companies amid US-Venezuela conflict?
summary: As geopolitical tensions rise following a US military strike on Venezuela, Reliance and ONGC stocks face volatility. Experts suggest monitoring key support levels and accumulation zones, while highlighting differing impacts on these oil giants.&nbsp;

title: Warren Buffett shared his morning breakfast routine, and it is not the typical CEO 5 am, health-conscious grind
summary: A clip from the 2017 HBO documentary ‘Becoming Warren Buffett’ has gone viral on social media for the Oracle of Omaha's relaxed breakfast habits which starkly contrast with what is seen as the typical “successful CEO's routines”.

title: Planning to sell your house? Know the taxes and how to save on them
summary: Many individuals may not realise they owe tax on profits from selling residential properties. Capital gains tax rates vary based on holding periods, with exemptions available for reinvestment in new properties or specified bonds, provided certain conditions are met.

title: Adani Power shares may see another 23% growth, says JM Financial while initiating coverage
summary: JM Financial initiates coverage on Adani Power with a Buy rating and a target of Rs 178, citing robust capacity expansion, strong execution and India’s growing thermal power demand as key growth drivers.

title: From RIL to TCS: Stocks that added and wiped out market value for India's top 10 conglomerates in 2025
summary: India’s top 10 conglomerates saw a mixed 2025, with Reliance, HDFC, Adani, Bajaj, and Aditya Birla posting strong gains, while Tata and Godrej lost market value. Key drivers included telecom, metals, financial services, and autos, whereas IT and energy segments weighed on performance, highlighting divergent fortunes among India’s business giants.

title: European stocks rise as defence shares lead after Venezuela shock
summary: European stocks traded firmer on Monday, ‍extending their early-year ​gains as investors bought defense stocks ⁠after U.S. military strikes on Venezuela stirred fresh geopolitical concerns.

title: Defence biggest theme of decade and not oil, natural resources or forex. Gurmeet Chadha explains why
summary: Defence has emerged as the defining investment theme of the decade, says Gurmeet Chadha, emphasising that military strength now outweighs oil, natural resources or forex reserves in shaping national power. His remarks come amid geopolitical tensions between the US and Venezuela and a sharp rally in Indian defence stocks, underscoring strong structural momentum in the sector.

title: China stocks rally as Shanghai benchmark tops 4,000 in first New Year trade
summary: Chinese stocks kicked off 2026 with a strong rally, led by tech sectors, pushing the Shanghai Composite above 4,000 for the first time in nearly three months. Investors focused on innovation-led growth, particularly in AI and advanced manufacturing, despite ongoing structural challenges.

title: Realty pre-sales mixed in Q3, launch spillovers to set stage in Q4
summary: Early Q3 pre-sales updates show strong bookings for Sobha, while Godrej and Lodha’s estimated numbers indicate robust demand. However, delayed launches and cooling Mumbai market affordability warrant monitoring.

title: Sensex falls 300 points, Nifty 50 ends at 26,250 after US strikes Venezuela— 10 key highlights from Indian stock market
summary: The Sensex fell 322 points, or 0.38%, to end at 85,439.62, while the Nifty 50 ended at 26,250.30, down 78 points, or 0.30%. The mid and small-cap indices outperformed; the BSE Midcap index inched up by 0.05% and the Smallcap index rose by 0.07%.

title: Crude oil prices slip amid US-Venezuela conflict: What's the outlook for 'black gold' and reasons behind fall? Explained
summary: While the immediate effect on oil market is seen as limited, the change in control over Venezuela's vast oil reserves poses critical implications for heavy crude pricing and long-term supply forecasts.

title: Upcoming IPO: Hindustan Laboratories files DRHP with SEBI for an IPO; details here
summary: Hindustan Laboratories has filed its Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) with SEBI for an IPO, offering 1.41 million shares. The company aims to leverage fresh capital for working capital needs while providing generic medicines to government institutions.&nbsp;

title: Ola Electric share price extends rally to third session, surges over 8%. Is  ₹50 the next stop?
summary: Ola Electric's share price surged 8.3% to  ₹44.3, its highest level in eight weeks, driven by improved market share in December. The EV maker's market share rose to 9.3%, with significant gains in key states, signalling increased demand and recovery efforts.

title: Big IPOs could be coming in 2026. SpaceX, Anthropic, and OpenAI are on the list.
summary: The IPO market rebounded in 2025, and more big unicorns look set to debut on Wall Street this year.

title: BCCL IPO GMP jumps after announcement of price band, issue opening date
summary: BCCL IPO, a subsidiary of Maharatna PSU Coal India, has set a price band of  ₹21–23 per share for its upcoming issue.

title: Marico Q3 performance shows margin stability amid falling copra prices
summary: Margins are set to recover sequentially as falling copra prices ease cost pressures, but year-on-year pressure and volatile copra prices could cap gains.

title: Inox Clean Energy acquires 300 MWp of operational solar projects from SunSource Energy for  ₹1,000 crore
summary: The acquisition is a strategic move in India’s rapidly expanding commercial &amp; industrial power market, which appears poised for massive growth as more businesses shift to private clean-energy suppliers.

title: Charlie Munger's golden words that Warren Buffett believes in: ‘Write your obituary, live accordingly’
summary: A look at the advice from Charlie Munger on living well, that his friend and business partner Warren Buffett backs — “Write your obituary the way you want it written and then live your life accordingly.”

title: Will foreign consulting income be taxed in India if not remitted?
summary: Income from services performed in India is taxable regardless of where it is paid or received. Residential status under tax and FEMA laws determines reporting and repatriation obligations.

title: What are focused funds, and why should you add them to your portfolio? Top-performing schemes explained
summary: Focused funds are those mutual funds which invest in a limited number of stocks (maximum being 30) and at least 65% in equity and equity related instruments.

title: Why recent returns could be a risky guide to mutual fund investing
summary: Investors should dig deeper into historical returns, not just stop at funds’ recent performance. They must even go beyond returns for their fund selection. Here's why

title: Job loss, EMIs still due? A smart repayment plan for personal loan borrowers
summary: Job loss can disrupt finances but a clear plan helps manage personal loan EMIs through budgeting, early lender communication, repayment restructuring, income rebuilding and credit protection during employment transitions.

title: China decries U.S. action in Venezuela — even as it guards billions at stake
summary: China's immediate priority in the wake of the U.S. attack on Venezuela is to protect economic interests, analysts said.
